scripts.db:migrate: cd backend && pnpm prisma migrate dev
scripts.dev: pnpm db:up && concurrently --prefix "[{name}]" --names "BACKEND,FRONTEND" --prefix-colors "yellow,cyan" "pnpm dev:backend" "wait-on -t 30000 127.0.0.1:4000 && pnpm dev:frontend"
scripts.dev:full: pnpm db:up && pnpm db:migrate && pnpm codegen && concurrently --prefix "[{name}]" --names "BACKEND,FRONTEND" --prefix-colors "yellow,cyan" "pnpm dev:backend" "wait-on -t 30000 127.0.0.1:4000 && pnpm dev:frontend"
